roleset.name: diminish intensity

example.name: the one example
example.text: Shaken by tumbling stock prices and pessimistic projections ofU.S. economic growth, currency analysts around the world have toneddown their assessments of the dollar's near-term performance.
example.arg: Shaken by tumbling stock prices and pessimistic projections ofU.S. economic growth,
their assessments of the dollar's near-term performance.

roleset.note: TONE_DOWN-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from tone.01-v)
